Review Text:
This company really sells fantastic promotions.

1. They offer an extremely low minimum purchase for free shipping.
2. The FREE shipping is not the lowest tier but has tracking
3. Their brand name products are for the most part trustworthy - and because people are different (ages, blood types, lifestyles) - some of these products are given 5 stars by some - and 1 star by others - indicating by the large number of reviews (with details) that the main proportion give it high ratings and the reviews can be matched up with doctorate level research publications that show similar effects to different groups as posted in the reviews - and plenty of people seem to be repeat customers - and this creates a certain "up front" trust.

4. Product selection is fantastic.

5. Discounts are far more attractive than most every other vendor on the internet.

6. Additional discounts are given in the form of points that can be redeemed for repeat customers - and the rewards are significant and generous considering the cost.

7. I have never had any trouble with any order - ever.

All this seems to exceed every dimension of concern for any buyer - except one - and that is - yes - I have seen slightly better products out there and great discounts with free shipping - however - these very specialized and normally expensive products - maybe twice as good in potency and quality - cost almost 10 times as much as Swanson. So for me - why pay extremes for 1000 mg of super high quality standardized to 3 times the potency per mg of Swanson for $2.50 per pill - when I can take 8 pills from Swanson to get the same effect - for about 1.5 cents per pill? (That usually means a big discount to get the price down that low) - but still makes it worth it.

And understand this best stuff out there - in many cases is only just slightly better for 5 times the cost. Swanson may not be the Top of the Line Ultimate - but for a small fraction of the cost - and getting far higher quality than most others - practically speaking - Swanson is really about the best possible choice.
